mapper.insert: insert into messages (message_id, message_detail, message_status, psot_time, message_type, from_user_id, to_user_id) values (#{messageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{messageDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{messageStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{psotTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{messageType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fromUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{toUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update messages set message_detail = #{messageDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, message_status = #{messageStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, psot_time = #{psotTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, message_type = #{messageType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, from_user_id = #{fromUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, to_user_id = #{toUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where message_id = #{messageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select message_id, message_detail, message_status, psot_time, message_type, from_user_id, to_user_id from messages where message_id = #{messageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select message_id, message_detail, message_status, psot_time, message_type, from_user_id, to_user_id from messages
